name: Bacta 2 The Resurrection of Bacta
summary: The sequel to Bacta directly continues the story initiated in the first game. The paranormal investigator Jinpachi Tanaka was unable to defeat the female demon Dirsala, and she intends to resurrect the mysterious magical creation known as Bacta. In order to prevent that Jinpachi must work together with the local police and his faithful assistance, all the while continuing to save young women from demonic possession in his own unique ways.
info:
• 平台: PC98
  • 平台: FM-TOWNS
  • 游戏类型: ADV

  • 音楽: 神奈江 紀宏
